name: Milky Season
overview: As the newly appointed manager of female student dormitory, the player interacts and potentially finds love with 12 beautiful girls. The game begins when the player's character arrives at the student dormitory and one of the girls start showing him all the different rooms and girls bedrooms, after that all the 12 girls start to introduce to him. After know all the places and people the game begins and the player will have 2 different choices to choose one of them, and depending of his choices the game ending will be different and the stats with the different girls will be better or worse. The game features japanese voice acting, different endings and an unlockable CG gallery with the diifferent images that are displayed during the game.
